name: My Life as a Teenage Robot: Vexus Strikes Back
name_original: My Life as a Teenage Robot: Vexus Strikes Back
description:
Vexus reprogrammed all Chips from the Robots in the Cluster so that the Robots have to obey her. 

You can you get to the cluster to Fight Vexus?

Beta Gameplay (Version 0.0.6)

Gameplay Video 1 from: No Return From 86

Gameplay Video 2 from: My Life as a Teenage Robot Fanbase

If you make a video about my Game, link it to me on twitter ( @NebelStupid ) and you'r video will get here :)
